text: Warning : This post contains major spoilers about Wednesday ’ s Law & Order : Special Victims Unit. Brooke Shields has about a hundred film and TV credits, as well as two Golden Globe nominations and an iconic Calvin Klein commercial, on her resumé. Still, on her first day working alongside friend Mariska Hargitay on Law & Order : Special Victims Unit, “ I was so nervous to come into this well - oiled machine that I called her my character ’ s name, ” Shields said, laughing. She ’ s referring to the scene that ended this week ’ s episode of the NBC procedural : Olivia, who at the top of the episode was relieved to hear that her child - abuse investigation had been closed, answers a knock at her apartment door to find Shields standing on the other
